aberrantQuesrist.bugfix: Updates the date to reflect the new year.

aberrantQuesrist.refactor: Pulls the floors.dmi file apart into an easier navigable and better organized batch. QoL for spriters.

aberrantQuesrist.rscadd: New turf types, sands and grass.
New sprites for sand, saltwater, and modified mosaic tiles.

PineappleMan929.spellcheck: little accent thing so people spell inquisition titles right

aberrantQuesrist.bugfix: Male cows no longer have udders.

flleeppyy.code_imp: add new CI linter to check for unescaped brackets

KevinfromHP.balance: tweaked dungeoneer's loadout, giving them knuckles and adjusting skills.

Rockslp.rscadd: Adds several new items to the patreon loadout options.

Somniworld.balance: Made all mage summons give the same amount of resources for their tier. For instance a sprite now drops 6 fairy dust, the same way an imp drops 6 Infernal ashes.

Somniworld.bugfix: Noc's Eye warded summoning matrices no longer get bricked if you try to summon something alone.

snowyseshi.bugfix: gave abyssal guard their weapon skill and removed their swordfish

KevinfromHP.bugfix: Removed the ability for pacifists to wrestle

Gigigger.bugfix: now Blood Pact provides DARK attunement, instead of DEATH attunement, as intended

Somniworld.rscadd: Adds a new ring for the apothecaries, making it clear they can extract and manipulate lux without repercussions so long as they're not being heretics.

Somniworld.image: changed the way the feldsher's ring looks, to make it fit more with our visual identity.

Somniworld.bugfix: Werewolves got their combat mode track back.

TerraGS.bugfix: Female apothecary boots no longer vanish when facing east.
Dead people no longer feel the effects of bloodloss.

Rockslp.rscadd: Adds the folkheroes migrants, moving certain rare adventurers into here.
Added the Men-at-arms Axeman, a heavy armor axe role.
Adds a tribal tattoo with 0 protection for exiled warrior that takes up the armor slot as a nerf.
Poison resilience for Old Apothecary, huffing poisons builds up a tolerance.
Padded Gambeson to Hedgemage, currently one of the weakest wretches.

Rockslp.rscdel: Removed harddismember from enforcer, makes them easier to balance around if they don't have a werewolf trait.

Rockslp.balance: Rebalances skills & stats on most classes in the game, aswell as some loadouts.
Rebalances most classes that were expert to be skilled users instead, all mercenaries have lost expert weapon skills.
Peasants and Serfs get a statline of +3, it was a bit all over the place. Old-party serfs get +4.
Changes the tavern brawler Be Special to give lower skill levels.

Rockslp.bugfix: Fixed the double stat+skill input in the Court-Magos file.
Stats being listed twice on the anthraxi male job has been fixed.

Rockslp.code_imp: Changed a bunch of stat values on a bunch of jobs.

Rockslp.refactor: Removed the donator adventurer folder and moved them either into the folkheroes folder or the rare folder.

WhataTerribleUserName.rscadd: Adds new face armor for Graggar Iconoclast.

WhataTerribleUserName.balance: Changes coverage and integrity of Vicious Helm.

Snack-Max.rscadd: Adjusted Gallowglass helmet, gave gallowglass and kerns, Mage blue kilts and sashes

Rockslp.rscdel: Inquisition no longer allows aasimars within their formal ranks, only aasimar adepts.
Dwarves no longer get promoted to Prefekts, they will forever stay in hopes of a promotion.

KevinfromHP.bugfix: not being able to close hidden doors very easily.

KevinfromHP.map: Inquisition gets their own door set.

Somniworld.balance: Psydonian helmets have a 180° Field Of View

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fixed potential issues with spell channelling and death

Rockslp.rscdel: Removed medium armor trait from spellmage.

Rockslp.balance: Reduce spell mage wrestling and strength

Rockslp.rscdel: Removes zizo from archivist options, he's one of noc's closely watched

Rockslp.balance: Changes dreamwatcher stats to more alike the other archivist advclass.

Rockslp.bugfix: Fixed archivist dwarves running around with their belly flopping about

Rockslp.balance: Raises priest fist-fighting (NOT THEIR WRESTLING THOUGH!!!!)

TheMrGlasses.bugfix: Values for a few stress events are now applied correctly.

TerraGS.bugfix: You will no longer count single coin values multiple times.

Raptorian1.bugfix: made mobs stop attacking each other.

Ediblebomb.spellcheck: Fixed two cases of \"the the\" and \"the 1.\" in bedsheet application/removal code.

Ediblebomb.bugfix: Fixed bedsheets having a permanent pickup delay after being applied to and removed from a bed.
Fixed wool double beds only allowing one buckled mob.

snowyseshi.rscadd: hardcore rat is now a small rat and can't speak

ModDownloading.bugfix: Leprosy quirk stops pain just like the triumph buy one now.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Various fixes to human examine code.

CheffieGithub.balance: Faceless assassins can no longer be seen if they are unknown.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fixed jobs selectable items not always having options roundstart

tired-wired.rscadd: Added some candle sprites from Azure.

snowyseshi.code_imp: athletics and climbing are now clamped to average.

TheMrGlasses.balance: Daywalker migrant job rebalanced and changed (No longer a worse witch hunter)

Somniworld.rscadd: Coffins may now be sealed with tallow. This can consecrate them like a grave.
Sealed coffins can be opened with daggers and knives on cut intent.
A grave may now be double-consecrated by burying a consecrated coffin and using burial rites on the resulting grave. This makes graverobbing trigger an alarm that alerts the temple.
Red Tallow may now be made by using viscera on normal tallow. Viscera is created by grinding sinew.\nadd : New sprites for consecrated coffins, double-consecrated graves.

Somniworld.code_imp: fixes a typo in the bobcat's description.

CheffieGithub.balance: Black mirror can only track it's feeder or a select person for its 2 minute window.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fixed black mirror selection being broken.

Rockslp.rscdel: Removed Harpy and Triton from Court Physician

Ediblebomb.rscadd: Added a Swordsman Men-At-Arms subclass. They get the same equipment as Pikeman, but with a heater shield instead of a pike, skilled Swords and Shields, and marginally worse stats.

Somniworld.rscadd: Adds a new hood made out of leather to the game. The \"reformed thief\" adept subclass spawns with it by default.

TerraGS.bugfix: Looking up into nullspace no longer runtimes

TerraGS.refactor: replaces the transparent turf subtype with a turf transparency element

Neuroplasty.bugfix: Made herbal remedies not stress you out anymore.

snowyseshi.map: medical guide moved a few tiles to its place

Diegoflores31.balance: removes bombcrafting from: porter , jester and plague doctor.

Diegoflores31.bugfix: breaching charge now can be used properly to mine.

Diegoflores31.refactor: breaching charges now use timers instead of process , reworked the logic for cinematic effect.

Diegoflores31.bugfix: minimun_skill_required now actually means minimun skill required.

realforest2001.code_imp: Removed unused span defines and style classes.

realforest2001.qol: Job restrictions now show timelock required before checking species/age etc.

KevinfromHP.rscadd: kobolds cant eat magic rocks for spells anymore
you can stick kobolds in smelters now

realforest2001.qol: Role-Unique verbs are now all in one tab (where practical to do so).

realforest2001.bugfix: Objects that fall from above no longer show as \"the floor\".
Failing to pick a job subtype (such as bloodsucker wretch equipment) will no longer brick you.

ApolloVector.balance: Fighter Average shield skill -> Skilled shields
Zizo inhumen cleric shield skill bonus +1 instead of +2, resulting in skilled shields instead of expert
Captain Skilled shield skill -> Expert shields
